aqi.title: Air quality
aqi.no_index_desc: No GIOS index for this station right now.

descriptions.very_good: Very good air quality. Outdoor activity without limits.
descriptions.moderate: Acceptable; sensitive people may feel effects.
descriptions.bad: Avoid outdoor activity; sensitive people should stay inside.

tooltip.pm25_about: PM2.5 is fine particulate matter <2.5 um. It penetrates deep into lungs and blood.
tooltip.pm10_about: PM10 is larger particulate matter <10 um. It irritates eyes, nose and upper airways.
tooltip.no2_about: NO2 is nitrogen dioxide mainly from exhaust. It irritates lungs and worsens asthma.
tooltip.o3_about: O3 is ground-level ozone. It forms in sunlight from urban emissions. It can irritate throat and chest.
